title: Minimalist Scandinavian-Style Duplex in Radziwie, Plock
description: Step into understated elegance with this thoughtfully designed Scandinavian-inspired duplex. Offering 4 bright bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms across 165 sqm, the home combines crisp, minimalist aesthetics with warm natural accents. An open-plan living area centers around a sleek contemporary fireplace, opening out to a private terrace with a dedicated barbecue zone—perfect for relaxed evenings. Wonderful for families or households needing versatile space, the property delivers functional luxury in harmony with nature.
neighborhood_description: Located in Radziwie—an enchanting suburb of Plock with a medium urban atmosphere—the neighborhood is shaped by a peaceful, balanced lifestyle and a refreshingly relaxed pace. You’ll enjoy nearby green spaces, playgrounds, and excellent connections by public transport and highway for swift commutes across town or outward to Warsaw. Everyday conveniences, shops, and local schools round out a comfortable living experience.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to city center and major routes
target_buyer: Perfect for professionals relocating for work, especially those seeking tranquility with seamless connectivity. Families valuing a minimalist and functional home will find comfort and space to grow; executive couples wanting a peaceful retreat with room to entertain will feel at home here.
market_positioning: Strategically positioned as a premium duplex within a desirable and growing neighborhood, offering rare Scandinavian-inspired features and curated outdoor living just outside the city’s hustle. Has strong appeal for high-earning professionals and families shifting from higher density neighborhoods.
